<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dualistic Synergy](/Feats.aspx?ID=1116) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Halcyon Speaker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=30)

**Prerequisites**
[Halcyon Speaker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1115)

</column>

---

If your next action is to Cast a Spell from your spell slots, you gain a benefit. If the spell is arcane, you can attempt a skill check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) with a +1 status bonus to the check after casting the spell, or a +2 status bonus if the spell is 7th level or higher. If the spell is primal, you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to the spell’s level for 1 round. If the spell is a halcyon spell, you gain both benefits.

<title level="2">Dualistic Synergy leads to...</title>
[Fulminating Synergy](/Feats.aspx?ID=1123), [Shared Synergy](/Feats.aspx?ID=1119)
name: Dualistic Synergy
